mapper.select: select *, p10_institution.ins_name as entrustedInsName, p10_outles.outles_name as entrustedOutlesName from p10_transfer_record left join p10_institution on p10_institution.ins_id=p10_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id left join p10_outles on p10_outles.outles_id=p10_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id where p10_transfer_record.del_flag=0 and p10_transfer_record.source_id=#{sourceId} and p10_transfer_record.transfer_type=#{transferType}

SELECT p10_assets_bank_loan_re.mortgage_amount,p10_assets_bank_loan_re.mortgage_time,p10_assets_bank_loan_re.subject_id,p10_assets.*,p10_address.* FROM p10_transfer_record LEFT JOIN p10_assets_bank_loan_re ON p10_assets_bank_loan_re.bank_loan_id = p10_transfer_record.source_id and transfer_type=0 LEFT JOIN p10_assets ON p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_bank_loan_re.assets_id LEFT JOIN p10_address ON p10_address.user_id = p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type=4 WHERE p10_transfer_record.del_flag = 0 and p10_transfer_record.project_id=#{projectId}

SELECT p10_mortgage_assets_records.* FROM `p10_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_mortgage_assets_records ON p10_mortgage_assets_records.bank_loan_id = p10_transfer_record.source_id WHERE p10_transfer_record.del_flag = 0 and p10_transfer_record.project_id=#{projectId}
